attributes.action: TAKE US OUT OF THE EU AS THE UK WAS TAKEN IN ILLEGALLY AGAINST OUR CONSTITUTION
attributes.background: I BELIEVE THAT THE UK WAS TAKEN ITO THE EU AGAINST ITS CONSTITUTION OR OUR EQUIVALENT. THE HEATH GOVERNMENT  PUSHED THIS BILL THROUGH PARLIAMENT SO I BELIEVE IT'S IN THE BRITISH INTERESTS TO CHALLENGE THIS .

rejection.details: We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. The UK has already voted to leave the European Union.
